mail_subject: Q4 FY24 JBP Support - Electronics Category
mail_body:
Dear Team,

This is to inform you about our Q4 FY24 Joint Business Plan support for Electronics category.

Scheme Details:
- Period: January 1, 2024 to March 31, 2024
- Support: 5% of NLC
- Applicable on: All sellout during the period
- Brand: Samsung, LG, Sony

Please ensure timely claim submission.

Regards,
Vendor Team

Dear Sir/Madam,

We are reducing the NLC for Product XYZ effective January 15, 2024.

Old NLC: Rs. 10,000
New NLC: Rs. 9,500
Price Drop: Rs. 500

Claim eligibility: Stock as on January 14, 2024

Price drop date: January 15, 2024

Please raise PDC claims accordingly.

Thanks,
Brand Team

Hi Team,

For the upcoming festive season, we are offering sellout support.

Scheme: Diwali Sellout Campaign
Period: October 1 to October 31, 2024
Support: 3% on sellout value
Min Order: Rs. 50,000
Max Cap: Rs. 25,000 per invoice

Category: Home Appliances

Kindly participate actively.

Regards
